Package controls

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controls.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControllerForModel, IControllerForView
public class Controller extends Object implements IControllerForModel, IControllerForView
The Controller class handles the main interaction between the simulation view and model. It manages user inputs, controls the simulation engine, and updates the UI elements such as customer visualization, financial data, and simulation results.
